summary: The main window class provides the central graphical interface for the application, assembling toolbars, menus, and content areas, and handling user actions related to file analysis, configuration changes, daemon monitoring, and trust database management.
business_intent: It allows system administrators or security analysts to interact with the underlying analysis engine and daemon, perform file scans, apply and revert configuration changes, manage trust policies, and monitor system status through an integrated UI, thereby simplifying complex security and configuration workflows.
